title: Ticket #4754: JobRouter doesn't set Managed to ScheddDone after the job completes
description:
When a routed job completes, the JobRouter marks its source job as completed but doesn't do any other cleanup with DestroyProc(), which can lead to race conditions in file stageout. We would like the JobRouter's cleanup behavior to more closely match that of the GridManager.

More information can be found in #4719 under "Jaime's comments".
